backend/main.mo: Defines data types for moods, chat, analytics, user profiles, and market metadata, including comparison helpers and storage-related structures.
feature_evidence.json: Report linking feature changes to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base definitions and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, authentication (guest and II), profile setup, session tracking, and view selection.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserDrilldo: Displays detailed admin view of a user, including identity, mood entry stats, loading/error states, and tabs for mood history.
Shows a user's mood history with calendar and chart views, including date selection and multiple trend visualizations.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: AI chat component managing session-scoped messages, session context, greeting initialization, and streamed AI responses.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Admin dashboard that loads analytics and user data, handles admin checks, and provides navigation to per‑user drilldowns.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Manages Internet Identity and guest login flows, including profile setup, validation, and login state handling.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: Admin UI for editing app metadata and pricing settings with loading states and save handlers.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Renders a chat room UI with message fetching, auto-scroll, room info display, and message sending logic. Includes loading skeletons, refresh, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatRoomDi: Provides a dialog to create new chat rooms with name/topic inputs and mutation handling. Generates unique room IDs and shows success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Displays the main dashboard with date display, navigation to rooms and private chats, and dialogs for creating rooms. Loads chat rooms and private threads while managing daily date updates.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing logo, user info, and navigation buttons including admin-only items. Supports desktop and mobile layouts with a collapsible menu.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMoodTrend: Computes weekly mood averages for the current month and renders them as a bar-style trend chart. Handles empty mood data with a fallback message.
frontend/src/components/MoodCalendar.tsx: Displays a month or week calendar with mood entries, allowing users to select days with recorded moods.
frontend/src/components/MoodEditor.tsx: Provides a UI to edit or update a mood entry for a specific date, including mood selection and notes.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Shows the user’s mood history with charts and a calendar, enabling editing of existing entries.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Allows users to log a new mood entry with optional wellness data and select the date for the entry.
frontend/src/components/OverallMoodTrend: Calculates and displays monthly average mood scores in a bar chart to show long-term trends.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Lets users view and navigate through a sequence of presentation slides with thumbnail previews.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Renders a private chat UI, fetching messages, handling sending, auto‑scrolling, and showing thread participant info.
frontend/src/components/StartPrivateChat: Dialog for starting a new private thread by entering another user's principal and creating a unique thread ID.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Displays weekly mood insights including summaries, clusters, and anomalies with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodSummar: Computes and displays the current week's average mood, label, and insight text based on mood entries.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodTrendl: Generates per‑day mood averages, emojis, and an SVG regression trendline for the current week's mood data.
frontend/src/hooks/guestAuthStore.ts: Implements a singleton guest session store with localStorage persistence, migration, and pub‑sub updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides hooks to log user or guest activity events through the backend, including login and navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: Handles guest login state, syncing with a guestAuthStore and exposing login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing AuthClient creation, login flow, stored identity restoration, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chat, messaging, and other backend operations with error handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks user session duration and reports it periodically or on page unload to the backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based light/dark theme color variables.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Defines AI safety constraints and helper validators for detecting unsafe content, reflective language, and permission prompts.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Generates AI responses using stage-based templates, applies constraints, adds crisis messaging, and updates conversation context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Implements keyword-based logic to select conversation stages and update session context, including crisis detection and theme extraction.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages session-scoped chat context with load/save/clear helpers and provides a simple session summary string.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines response templates for each conversation stage, including main messages and optional follow‑up questions.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Chooses and adapts response templates based on session context, adding optional follow‑ups and minor personalization.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Declares conversation stage enums and interfaces for session context, response constraints, and stage responses.
frontend/src/lib/linearRegression.ts: Provides a least‑squares linear regression utility returning slope, intercept, and a predict function.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Classifies mood‑related errors into permission, availability, or unexpected types and logs detailed debug info.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Provides conversions between local dates and IC nanosecond timestamps with BigInt‑safe math and date utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility for merging class names using clsx and tailwind‑merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Generates weekly mood summary labels, insights, and empty‑state messages based on average scores and entry counts.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Implements Monday‑Sunday week calculations, including week boundaries, day indexing, and weekday formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity before rendering the root component.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend TypeScript interfaces mirroring backend structures for mood data, user profiles, analytics, messages, and marketplace metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, border radii, and enabling plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, and feature requirements, including a regression affecting the guest login flow and session propagation.
